                                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/pr/campos-gerais-sul/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="campos gerais e sul"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        campos gerais e sul
                                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/pr/norte-noroeste/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="norte e noroeste"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        norte e noroeste
                                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/pr/oeste-sudoeste/" class="menu-item-link item-afiliada" title="oeste e sudoeste"><span class="menu-item-title">
                                                        oeste e sudoeste
                                                    </span></a></li></ul></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/rs/rio-grande-do-sul/" class="menu-item-link state rio-grande-do-sul" title="rio grande do sul" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-rio-grande-do-sul">
                                        rio grande do sul
                                    </span></a></li><li class="menu-item"><a href="/sc/santa-catarina/" class="menu-item-link state santa-catarina" title="santa catarina" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-santa-catarina"><span class="menu-item-title" data-submenu-id="list-subregions-santa-catarina">
                                        santa catarina
                                    </span></a></li></ul><span class="back">voltar</span></div></div></div><style type="text/css">
    .menu-addon-lazy-load {
        display: none;
    }
</style><script type="text/javascript">

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-cb1a54d3-f59c-44ac-a8f5-46d9cf862d3c');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div class="bastian-card-mobile"><section id="widget-card-agenda-de-shows" class="gui-card widget-card-agenda-de-shows"

                        Sol com algumas nuvens. Chove rápido durante o dia e à noite.

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 14:34:50 --></html>
|||http://g1.globo.com/mg/grande-minas/|<!DOCTYPE HTML><!--[if IE 9]><html class="ie9" lang="pt-br"><![endif]--><html lang="pt-br" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage"><head><meta charset="utf-8"><link rel="preload" href="https://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js" as="script"><link rel="preload" href="http://tags.globo.com/utag/globo/g1/prod/utag.js" as="script"><script type="text/javascript">
        var gptadslots = [];
        var googletag = googletag || {};
        googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
    </script><script id="gpt_js" async="true" type="text/javascript" src="https://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js"></script><!-- TEALIUM --><script type="text/javascript">

    var utag_data = {"structure_tree": "[\"G1\", \"MG\", \"Grande Minas\"]", "ad_site_page": "afintertvmgg1/grandeminas", "page_name": "index", "ad_positions": "{\"mobile\": [\"banner_rm2\", \"banner_feed_esppub\", \"banner_mobile_topo\", \"banner_rm3\", \"banner_mobile_fim\"], \"desktop\": [\"banner_feed_esppub\", \"banner_slb_meio\", \"banner_insert\", \"banner_rm2\", \"banner_rm3\", \"banner_floating\", \"banner_slb_topo\"]}"};

</script><script type="text/javascript">
        (function (a, b, c, d) {
            a = 'http://tags.globo.com/utag/globo/g1/prod/utag.js';
            b = document;
            c = 'script';
            d = b.createElement(c);
            d.src = a;
            d.type = 'text/java' + c;
            d.async = true;
            a = b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0];
            a.parentNode.insertBefore(d, a);
        })();
    </script><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s2.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s3.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://tags.globo.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://tags.tiqcdn.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://www.google-analytics.com'><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/opensans/regular.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/opensans/bold.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/proximanova/regular.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/proximanova/bold.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><title>

               class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link js-card-tempo-region-link">
                PREVISÃO COMPLETA
                <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></section></div><!-- gerado em: 2017-03-27T19:37:12Z --><div class="bastian-card-mobile"><section id="widget-card-programacao" class="gui-card widget-card-programacao glb-style-card-programacao--intertvmg "

                        PROGRAMAÇÃO

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 18:35:38 --></html>

  <div class="default-2-3"><div class="content-border"><div class="content-border-content"><div class="accent-after"><div class="accent-before"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35055" class="file file-video file-video-youtube">
  <div class="media-youtube-video media-youtube-1">
  <iframe class="media-youtube-player" width="640" height="360" title="Conexao 7.5: Aatrox e os suportes" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/kBq237qrvEM?wmode=opaque&rel=0&cc_load_policy=1&cc_lang_pref=pt-BR" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen>Video of Conexao 7.5: Aatrox e os suportes</iframe>
