.riot-apollo .riot-discussion {
  background-color: #dedede;
  color: #2b2b2b;
  line-height: 1.5;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-family: "Gill Sans W04", "Gill Sans", "Gill Sans MT", GillSans, Calibri, "Trebuchet MS", sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.5;
  max-width: 600px;
  min-width: 360px;
  text-align: left;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion h1 {
  font-size: 200%;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion h2 {
  font-size: 100%;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion h2 em {
  font-weight: normal;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion a {
  color: #076295;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion a:hover {
  color: #02A2FF;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion a:visited {
  color: #076295;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion ul {
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion ul li {
  line-height: 1.3;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-discussion-masthead h1 span.riot-discussion-login-link {
  font-size: 10pt;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-discussion-masthead select {
  background: white;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  -moz-box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  border: 1px solid #bbbbbb;
  color: #222222;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding-left: 10px;
  text-shadow: none;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-discussion-displayed-count {
  background: #f2f2f2;
  color: #257372;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: "Gill Sans", "Gill Sans MT", GillSans, Calibri, "Trebuchet MS", sans-serif;
  font-size: 10px;
  border-color: none;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-more {
  background-color: #c8c8c8;
  border: none;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-more a {
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  color: #257372;
  font-family: "Gill Sans", "Gill Sans MT", GillSans, Calibri, "Trebuchet MS", sans-serif;
  background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,');
  background-position: 0 1px;
  padding-left: 22px;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-more.bar {
  background-color: #c8c8c8;
  border: none;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion .riot-comment {
  background: #e9eaec;
  /* Comment Horizontal Seperator */
  /* Comment Action Links */
  /** Zebra Striping & Spacing **/
  /* Comment Level 1 */
}

  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;

.riot-apollo .riot-reply-form-container textarea {
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #cbcbcb, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;

  border: none;
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
}

  color: #1a1818;
}

  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px #bababa, 0px 6px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) inset, 0px 2px 8px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) inset, 1px 1px 0 0 #f9f9fa, -1px -1px 0 0 #a7a7a7;
  border: none;
  background-color: white;
  -webkit-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in, border-color 0.2s ease-in, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in;
  -webkit-transition-delay: 0, 0, 0;
  -moz-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
  -o-transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
  transition: background-color 0.2s ease-in 0, border-color 0.2s ease-in 0, box-shadow 0.2s ease-in 0;
}

  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 10px;
}

   Buttons

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion {
  /* Button */
  /* Button color swapping */
}

  padding: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.riot-apollo .riot-discussion button.post {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border-style: solid;
  border-width: 3px;
  border-radius: 0;
  text-shadow: none;
  -webkit-box-shadow: none;
  -moz-box-shadow: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  width: auto;
  font-family: "Adobe Garamond Pro",Garamond,Baskerville,"Baskerville Old Face","Hoefler Text","Times New Roman",serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-decoration: none;
  padding: 6px 20px 4px 20px;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
  color: #222;
  border-color: #f6c653 #bd6a23 #b6631f #e8ab4a;
  background: #d79922 url("http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/lolkit/1.0.24/resources/images/lol-textures.jpg") no-repeat 50% -854px;
}
